modName: T.A.Z Visual Overhaul TREE LOD FIX
summary: Fixes the tree lod's excessive brightness.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]SINCE THERE IS A WEATHER MOD INCLUDED WITH TAZ VISUAL OVERHAUL THAT WORKS IN A DIFFERENT WAY THAT THE ENB ITSELF, THE LODS WILL LOOK TOO DARK DEPENDING ON THE HOUR OF THE DAY AND THE WEATHER.

[/u][/b][size=5][font=Courier New]New Version Added, fixes the brightness of snowy trees!!!![/font]
[/size]
MxR Complained about the LOD being too bright, and since he was right, I decided to fix it

This little mod is an attempt to fix the bright tree lod when using TAZ Visual Overhaul. I made the tree lod darker so that it looks like the rendered trees.

So far, it just fixes the vanilla lod, but I will probably support AOF HD tree LOD and SFO soon.

NOT FINISHED YET, FEEL FREE TO MODIFY IT ASÂ YOU PLEASE.
author: slamm98 aka nirnhogg
